target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how to remove gum]
input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I help you today? Hi I have a question about a pair of boots you have on your site it's the calvin klein ones Okay, did you have a specific question I can answer for you? I was looking at it and was wondering how easy it would be to clean off stuff like gum off the shoe That's a good question, let me check that out for you. Can I have your name please? Sanya Afzal You can rub some peanut butter on the gum with a butter knife. After about 10-15 minutes the gum should mix with the peanut butter. Scrape all this off and clean with soap and water. Can I help with anything else today? hmm peanut butter I would not have thought of that cool appreciate it. that's it for me Have a great day!

target: pull up the costumer account [norman bouchard]; validate purchase [nb964325, nb964325@email.com, 1095890473]; check membership level [bronze]; update order information [by mail]
input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? Well, hello there. Hi I wanted to return an item I purchased for my boss because I accidentally got the wrong size. Okay, I can help you with that So that I can take a look at your account, may I ask your full name, username, email address, and the order ID? Not a problem. I'm Norman Bouchard and my user name is nb964325. My email address is nb964325@email.com and the order ID of the item I want to return is 1095890473 and finally, may I also ask your membership level (either Guest, Bronze, Silver, or Gold) My member level is classified as bronze Okay, looks like we should be in good shape here We can accept any returns if you have your receipt or if they are in their original packaging.  And even if you don't have any receipts, I can still accept returns that were made any time in the last 90 days Perfect. The item has not been taken out of its original packaging (my boss knew immediately it was the wrong size) Ah, I see.  Well in that case, depending on your preference, you can either return the item to a store, to a drop-off center, or by mail If you'd like the last option, I can send you a shipping label that will allow you to simply drop the package right back into the mail Would it be okay if I drop the item off to a store. I think i might try to see if there is something else he might like anyways. Yes, that would be fine. I'll just go ahead and make a note in your account Perfect. Do I need to take any paperwork with me to the store? As long as it's still packaged, you shouldn't need anything else Okay great Is there anything else I can help you with today? No that's all thanks You're welcome.  Have a great day, Mr. Bouchard You too!

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting Acmebrand. How may I help you? I need to check the status of a Shirt I ordered for my son.   I thought I paid by credit card but my account lists PayPal as the payment method. Sure thing, I'll be happy to help you with that. Could you provide me with your full name and account ID please? I believe my name is listed as David Williams.  The Account ID is 1VGSVKMH3K. Thank you David. I was able to pull up your account. Could I also have the Order ID so I can pull up the order? Yes.  The Order ID is 7488442726 Great I was able to find it. It does look like the payment was done with Paypal so lets see if theres still time to change it Could you tell me the shipping status? The shipping status says Delivered. Are you there? Sorry about that I temporarily lost my connection Let me retype that Great I was able to find it. It does look like the payment was done with Paypal so lets see if theres still time to change it Sorry. I was saying because it was already marked as delevered it is too late. But if you would like I can change the method for all future orders to use your Credit card would that be okay? Yes.  That would be great! Alright, I'll put that change through now. Was there anything else I could help you with today? No.   Guess I better check my doorstep for the delivery. Alright, thank you for shopping with us. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hi! This is Acme customer support. How may I help you today? Hey, could you tell me when I will be receiving my order? The conf. email is vague. Not a problem. Can you start by giving me your full name? Albert Sanders Just a moment Mr. Sanders. Thanks. Can I also have your Account ID and your Order ID? 9814276621Yep, VBNSCYTDVP and Sorry the message is distorted 9814276621 is my order ID No problem, my mind is often distorted as well. Ha I know how you feel Just a second while I look into the details on that. Excellent I'll need your Username and email address so that I can access that order. input: Dialogue: Hello. How can i help you today? I'm really confused. I was looking at a shirt yesterday, and it was one price. I look at it today and it's a higher price. What's that about? Crystal Minh 4LJBEQHQ1S okay thanks and can you please provide your order id? 5837444604 Okay this looks like the reason was that there was a market shift that was out of our control. Okay, but I shouldn't have to pay more just after one day. It's a big price difference! You can't do anything? Well you are a valued member I can issue you a promo code for the difference XHSPW Here you are I appreciate that. I feel a little better now. No problem Is there anything else I can do for you today? No, that's all I needed. All right. Well Thanks for reaching out and have a great day! you too!

Chloe Zhang Thank you Chloe, I was able to pull up your account. Thanks I'll also need to validate the order. Could you provide me with your Username, Email and order ID? Username: chloez76 Email Address: chloez76@email.com Order ID: 4633608720 Great everything looks good. How long have you been waiting for your package? 5 Days Thank you Chloe because it has only been 5 days I can't reship the order right away. Most items arrive in a couple of days but it can take up to 7. Okay Feel free to contact us again in a few days and we'll get the items reshipped to you immediately if they still havent arrived. Was there anything else I could help you with today? Okay Thanks Thats all Have a great day!

No, I'm good. Thanks, you just brought my stress level down. You have a good day now. Thank you and have a great day!

Give me one moment while I find this information for you. I apologize for the jeans being out of stock and we restock at the beginning of each month. I'd be happy to send a report to our Purchasing department to let them know about the issue. Sure, can I place an order now or do I just wait for the beginning of the month? I can place an order for the jeans for you since they are currently on backorder and then they would ship as soon as they become available. Ok, that sounds great!@ Should I use the credit card on your account? Sure You're order will arrive as soon as they become available in our warehouse. Is there anything else that I can help you with today? No, that's all I needed. Great! I hope you enjoy your week. Good-bye.

Do you want to change the delivery time from morning to evening? I think evening is better, yeah that way i'll be more likely to be home when it arrives Could I get your name or account ID? Joseph Banter (call me Joe) and BTGYYOHIRS Do you have this order's ID? 7166490904 I got an email that says it's in transit right now Okay Joe, thanks for that information. sure :) anything to stop the pirates, right, mately? matey lol Aye, Aye matey. Just so I know when to be home Between 7 and 9 PM. oh good I'm always home then The pirates won't get this piece of treasure! It's all mine :) Can I help you with anything else? no, that's it thanks for helping me foil the pirates :) Okay, keep an eye on that treasure chest and have a great day!

A premium membership lasts for the remainder of the calendar year in which it was obtained, and then for the full length of the following year So if you were to obtain Bronze status tomorrow, you would maintain those privileges through December 31, 2021 Did that answer your question? yes, that did it, thank you Excellent.  Is there anything else I can help you with? no, that is all Okay, have a great day.

input: Dialogue: can you tell me what the shirt is made of how many colors does it come in Hello, our shirts are most commonly made from pure cotton, with a 90% cotton and 10% linen blend. To be sure, you can check the label on the collar to indicate what material it is made out of. thank  you How wide is the collar of the shirt? What are the different sizes that the shirts comes in Hello, the standard collar is 15 inches. We also have a smaller collar at 14 inches and large one that is 16 inches. does it have any different logos or styles Our shirts come in a variety of sizes. If your desired size is listed as empty online, that means we are currently out of stock. We will refill our stock the second week of each month, I suggest checking back then. what are the different colors that it comes in Hello, I suggest checking online for all of the colors we offer. I do not have any further information on that, sorry about that. What is the length of the shirt The length of the sleeve is 32 inches on the small size, 34 inches on the medium size and 36 inches on the large size. What is the logo on the shirt I am not sure what the logo is. I would suggest checking online as we have a variety of shirt styles. Is there anything else I can help you with? that will be all Have a great day!

Is it possible to put it a day later in the afternoon so I am home? Thank you so much for clarifying, lets go ahead and get that sorted. First could you provide me with your full name and account ID? My name is Alessandro Phoenix and the account id is VY5XRU6CMN Thank you, and can I also have the order ID please? of course...it is 1984506136 Alright let me check the system to see if the delivery time is for the afternoon just in case. Alright it looks like it is indeed scheduled for early in the day so let's get that changed for you. Thank you so much! Is the same day but in the evening good for you? That would be perfect! Alright, the order has been updated and you're all set. Is there anything else I can help you with? Thank you so much for doing that for me....that will all be all for today! Have a great day and thank you for shopping with us! Have a great day too!

input: Dialogue: Welcome to AcmeBrands. How may I help? Hello, I was wondering what types of membership levels there are in your company. OK. I can help. One moment. We have bronze, silver, and gold. Gold gets unlimited returns Brone and silver get a certain amount of days to return items All three levels get preferential treatment oh, I am thinking of buying more stuff on your site and wondered what would be the best level to have. Gold is our highest level. It will allow you to try on as much as you like and return no questions asked. are there any shipping perks? Yes. Gold gets free shipping, and the other tiers get a reduced rate but not free. hmm sounds like gold is the way to go bt how much more is it going to cost to go from bronze to gold per month? Gold costs $50 for the year. Silver is $40 and brone is $20 Ok, with a new baby it seems Gold it is then. Thank you so very much. You're welcome. Anything else? No I think you done well. Stay well.

input: Dialogue: Hello Hi, how may I help you? Yes I seem to have a problem.  Every single instance where I try to search for an item, I get zero results. Ok, I can help you with that today. So you are having trouble using the search function on the website, correct? Yes everytime I enter something I get 0 results, it is frustrating! I'm very sorry you are having to go through this! I will try to help get it fixed right away. Ok, thank you Does it give the result "No results found" everytime you search? Absolutely.  I get that everytime. Ok great! We can fix that. One moment please Fantastic, no problem. Ok, the first thing to do is to try logging out of your account and then logging back in Let me know when you have done this please That one I have tried, but I will do it again real quick. Ok great, thank you Yes, same thing.  No change No problem, the next step is to clear your cookies. Do you know how to do that? I believe so, I have not done that yet.  I will give it a try. Ok, great. Let me know when you have completed clearing your cookies please. Had to remember my password again, haha.  But alas it seems to be working! Ok that is great news! Is there anything else I can help you with today? No you have been very helpful!  Now I can go shopping again! Enjoy your shopping and have a great day. Goodbye! Thank you, you too!

input: Dialogue: Hi, thanks for contacting us at AcmeBrands. How can I help you? yes, your website is running really slowly so much so that i really can't use it is there anything that you can do about this? Ok, sorry to hear that. Can I get your first name please? Rodriguez Sure, we can run through some troubleshooting steps and hopefully come to a resolution. yes please Thanks Rodriguez. First thing, can I have you try logging in and out of our website and see if that helps at all? sure, give me a second Sure thing. thanks...hrm, unfortunately that didn't work Ok, lets try something else. sure Can you try visiting another website, like google or yahoo and see if it loads up fine, or if it also loads slowly? sure one sec so google.com seems to load just fine with no noticable delays Ok, one last thing, can you close out any unnecessary tabs and programs and see if that improves anything? sure one minute please Sometimes too many things running at once can cause a slowdown issue. okay, great, i closed IE and then closed skype out and that seems to have fixed it when i go back in. the site is loading just fine now. thank you for the help! skype must have been the culprit Ok, fantastic! So happy we got it figured out. Is there anything else you needed help with today? Are you still there? yes sorry no thank you i was letting it fuly load No worries. In that case, since there is nothing further I can help with, have a fantastic day! thanks for your help you too

input: Dialogue: Hi there, thanks for contacting Acme! How can I help? Hi! I am thinking about buying boots. but I am not sure about the color. Sure thing, I'd be happy to help/ it is a Calvin Klein Boots. the price is $79 Can I get your first name? I want to know if it is black or dark brown. Joyce Wu Thanks Joyce. Let me find that out for you. One moment please. 90% of the boots we sell are black. We do have some that become a little lighter with wear though, and have more of a dark brown look. Oh good thing I ask because the color looks like dark brown You can find more info on our website at www.acmebrands.com Oh great. Thanks. Yep, some of them will lighten up a bit with wear. You're welcome. Did you need help with anything else? That's all. Thank you for the information. I will take a look at your website. Great! Have a fantastic day! Bye

input: Dialogue: Hello, thanks for contacting AcmeBrands, how may I assist you today? Hey, I want to buy some boots, but my credit card seems to be getting rejected What's going on? Sure, I can help you with that How many times have you entered your credit card info? Three times already And you're sure its not expired? Yea, it expires next year OK, can you please try a different credit card? I don't have another one, certainly not one for online shopping Hmm, so its a valid card and its not working Yup, I just used it earlier this week Maybe it is an issue with cookies on the AcmeBrands website Sometimes it helps to log out and then log back in again OK, i'll give that a shot By the way, I'm a gold member So you know that I've done quite a bit of shopping with this card before Yes, certainly.  Thank you for being a valued gold member Oh wow, actually I think logging in again helped! I'm able to make the purchase now and I think there's also new inventory as well That's wonderful! Yes, sometimes the website is updated and those who are still logged in have an older experience It shuts down purchasing ability to encourage people to refresh their session There should have been a banner that showed up when you first visited the page Oh yea, I think I saw something but instinctively closed the window No worries, is there anything else I can help you with? That's it, thanks! Have a nice day then! You too

Hi, I was looking to get information about the price of getting gifts wrapped I really stink at it and was looking to send a gift to someone from your store OK. Let me get your full name or account ID My full name is Norman Bouchard Thanks Norman. I have pulled up your account. Let me check on the price of gift wrap for you. Is that 4.99 per shirt, or can I have them wrapped together as one package for 4.99? You have to specify the message for each item if you buy multiple. Ok, that is what I needed to know. Yes. The $4.99 applies to the entire three if they are done together. perfect Great. Anything else? No, that's it, thank you very much

target: pull up the costumer account [alessandro phoenix]; validate purchase [ap322796, ap322796@email.com, 6830032452]; record reason [5]
input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeCorp, how may I help you today? Can you check to see where my package is? I've been waiting for over a week now for it. Oh no, I do apologize. Let me check. Since I ordered it, actually. It shipped 5 days ago. May I have your full name or account id? Sure, my name is Alessandro Phoenix Thank you may I please have your username, email address, and Order ID? My account id is PKGQS6UCQK username is ap322796 email is ap322796@email.com order ID is: 6830032452 Thank you Alessandro, how many days have you waited? Was is 5? Yes, that is correct, I got a notification that it shipped, but I haven't heard or seen anything else since It can take up to 7 days for the item to arrive so I would wait a couple more days Is there anything else I may help you with? So there's nothing on your end saying what the status is? Like it's stuck somewhere, or if it even actually shipped out? I was told it would only take 3 days with my expedited shipping request. I apologize, system issues. ok The system shows in progress, I do know that for an item it can take up to 7 days for it arrive. Then why pay expedited shipping if it's not true? That's not acceptable to me. I agree. I am going to credit back the shipping costs to your account. If the item does not arrive by the 7th day, we will overnight a new order. Ok, thanks. Is there anything else I may help you with today? I'll let you know if it doesn't come in for sure. No, that's all I needed. Thanks for your time. Thank you for contacting AcmeCorp, please be safe and stay well. You too

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrand. How may I help you? Hi! I had recently placed an order and I would like to manage the shipping details please. Sure thing, what about the shipping did you need to check on? I had ordered the wrong item by mistake Sure thing. Let's check on that for you. Could I have your Full name please? Crystal Minh Thank you Crystal. Could you tell me the shipping status of your order? Order received Thank you, just to clarify, were you checking to see if the order was correct because you found out somehow or did you know this yourself? I realized I had ordered the wrong item Alright thank you I just wanted to be sure. I'll also need your Username, Email address and order ID so I can validate the purchase, if you could provide those please? Can you check if I can order Tommy Hilfiger jeans in black instead of blue Black instead of blue. Let me update that on your order. Thank you Alright. I processed the change and everything looks good now. Was there anything Else I could help you with today? Thank you so much. You have been very helpful Not a problem Crystal. Thank you for shopping with us. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello! Thank you for contacting us today. How can I help you? Hi. I was wondering what are the consequences of paying a subscription payment late. Sure I can help you answer that question. Can I ask you your name please? Albert Sanders Thank you, Albert! Let me look that up for you. Okay Albert. There will be a fee for any late payment on a subscription service. The fee is two dollars per day past your deadline. If you are a gold or silver member you have a grace period of five late days each month. What if I'm a Gold member? If you are a gold member there is a 5 day grace period each month where the fee is not applied as long as you make the payment within those 5 days. Okay. Thank you then Is there anything else I can help you with today? Thank you, Albert! Have a great day!

If gold You get unlimited returns. If silver you are allowed to return only within the last 6 months and with bronze you are limited within the last 90 days but with guest you can only return within the l last 30 days Thank you! Do you need anymore help? No that's all. Have a great day.

I'm just trying to see what happened with the delivery time. I'm asking what's wrong with the time? Oh, sorry. It's scheduled for evening delivery but I thought it would come around noon with the mail. Okay, let me see what I can do to fix this for you. Can I have your full name? Yeah, Norman Bouchard And your account and order ID's? My account is V0MTNVNV1F and the order number is 0876054198. Okay, let me check what happened. Can I ask the shipping status of the order? It says it's already out for delivery. Well then I'm sorry to say this, but there's nothing I can do for you in this case. The system is showing me that the time requested when you ordered this was evening, and since it's already left our warehouse I can't change it. Ah, I must have set that up wrong. That's alright, just inconvenient today. Thanks anyway. Is there anything else I can do for you? No, I think that's it for now. Then have a nice day!

input: Dialogue: good afternoon, how can I help you? Hello there - I am trying to order something off your website but it's loading too slow It takes at least two minutes for any page to load and sometimes it just freezes This is not happening to me on other websites I understand, just to verify once you load the page, do you get any errors? No, but sometimes the images are jumbled looking ok let me notify the website team about this issue. one moment please so they review this problem. Okay Then let's do a series of steps to see if any one solves your problem. you already try to log out of your account and log back in? I have tried but it takes very long to do either of those things It is very frustrating I understand how you feel, let's see another solution that will help you. will you have multiple tabs open in your browser? This can cause slow browsing. I have one other tab open But things load okay on that one ok, let's do the following I have already notified the website team to review the problem, if you have a product in mind that you already want to buy I can make the purchase for you if you want. But if you just wanted to browse the website, I recommend waiting for the team to do the review. I don't know what I specifically wanted to buy I guess I can wait I understand, sorry for the inconvenience caused It's okay Thanks for your help in a few days everything should be in order not problem have a nice day

input: Dialogue: Hi, can you explain to me your typical return policy?  I am only a bronze level but often times things don't fit right. Sure, let me look into that for you. Bronze members are able to return items within a 90 day timeframe . If it has been longer than 90 days, you are able to return as long as you have a receipt or the item is still in the original package. Ok that should be fine.  I mean I put on weight and take it off pretty quickly but sometimes it just doesn't fit when it arrives Yes, you shouldn't have any problems as long as it's within that 90 days :) Can I help you with anything else?

input: Dialogue: Hello! What is the material of this jacket? Hello, you have a question about jackets, is that correct? Yes I would be happy to help with that. One moment please. Thank you The outer part of the jackets is polyester, nylon and tricot, which makes it wind-proof. The inside has a cotton lining for insulation. Is that all you were needing? I need to know how often I can wash this jacket. Depending on how often you wear the jacket would determine the washing frequency. If you wear it often, then at least twice during the cold season is fine. Thank you. Can it be washed at home? Can I use washing machine? Yes, a typical washing machine will work just fine. We do suggest a low heat during drying to keep it from shrinking. Thank you. Will that be all? Yes, Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Good afternoon, how can I help you today? Hi I want to buy these boots, but they're way overpriced compared to other sites! Why are you guys charging so much for them? Oh, I'm really sorry about that. Let me look in to this. Who am I speaking with today? My name is Rodriguez Can I get your full name to pull up your account? Or your account ID? My account ID is N1QSQVBJRZ Thank you Rodgriguez. Boots are quite expensive. Did you see these for a better price somewhere else? Yeah, they have them for $39 on Amazon Let me see if there is anything we can do about this. Can I get your full name and order ID? My full name is Rodriguez Domingo and the order ID is 3846280090 Thanks Rodriguez. I understand how frustrating it is is when you see a better price elsewhere. Prices fluctuate quite a bit and I really can't control them. So, how come you guys are charging $15 more for the boots? I can't guarantee that the boots are identical. The boots you guys sell are 100% authentic? Yes, we have great products and stand behind them. If it makes you feel any better I can give you a promo code for your next order. Okay, that'd be great. If you enter SVDVF you will get 25% off your next purchase. Terrific, thank you! You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with? That's it, thanks Thanks, enjoy the rest of your day.

LIIFDFYIO8 Im a gold member too  7334417122 there should be a shirt and jeans on that order too, 99$ each, yeah? I was able to locate your account. Okay, so just to clarify, you ordered those 3 items at the prices you mentioned, but your order is more than that? the email says the prices are higher than that but those are the prices I have from the order when I placed it Okay, so the difference is definitely in the prices of the item themselves, and it's not a difference in price of the shipping, or an extra random charge, right? nope Okay, let me look into the matter. I will get back to you as soon as I can. my shipping is free, right?  Gold member and all that hello? Hi, sorry. I was looking into the matter. I left before I read your message! ok, thought I lost you Sorry, I am still researching. I apologize for the wait ok, thanks for the help You don't have to pay shipping. ok, thanks hey, I'm good... While the prices of our items often change without notice, it does seem very strange that the price change occurred after you already ordered the item. I would be happy to offer you a discount. I would appreciate that We truly value your business. I am sorry it took me so long, I was trying to make sure I could determine the best way to assist you. understand I've discounted the cost of your order. I truly appreciate your patience. all good Is there anything else I can assist you with today? nope have a good day Thanks, you too!

input: Dialogue: Welcome to AcmeBrands. How may I help you? I just purchased a premium membership and wanted to know how long it's good for OK. Let me check that for you. One moment. Membership is based on when it is acquired. If you spend 501 on June 15th, July 1st will be your start date. It always finishes out the year and then adds one more. So, July 1st of this year will cover you until the end of the year and then add another year Okay.  Thank you So it lasts until December of next year Glad to help. Anything else I can help you with? Nope that is all

Let me let our purchasing department know that you're having this issue so we can provide a better service in the future. Give me one second. thank you Would you like me to put in a back order for you for the Calvin Klein boots? Yes please. How long do you think that would take? They should be back in stock within a week and then would ship immediately to you. Would you like to use the same credit card that is on your account? yes, thank you. Perfect. Here is how you get out a grass stain if it is fresh: First soak a household sponge in undiluted white vinegar and dab lightly on the stained area. No that was all, thanks. have a good one

target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how to remove gum]
input: Dialogue: Hello, how can i help you I'm thinking about buying thses boots but I can't help but picture them covered in sidewalk gum after not much wear and they're leather and would look awful caked in gum stains etc so just wondering what i could do about that Do you want tips on how to remove said gum> if there's a good way to do it without ruining the leather yeah What you would use is a butter knife get a glob of peanutbutter and gently rub it over the gum. Then depending on how soft the gum is  after 10 minutes it will be one with the peanut butter. Then you will be able to easily scrape everything off. After that then you just use soap and water. This method will destroy any gum remnants without damaging the leather. I see I think I could handle that and keep these boots nice for long enough thanks for the help today! Do you need any further help? no thank you take care Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you? Hey there I am curious about the pricing on having my name stitched on one of my items? Kinda like the old tv show Laverne and Shirly :) Which item? My tommy boots Stiching and engraving costs depend on how much text is added. Stiching costs 30 cents per character for the first 15 characters, 20 cents per character for the next 15 characters, and 10 cents per character for any additional characters. Engraving costs 40 cents per character for the first 15 characters, 25 cents per character for the next 15 charaters, and 10 cents per chaacter for any additional characters. Is there anything else I can help you with? no that was all. Thank you have a good day Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how are you doing today? Can you please tell me what happens if I am late paying for my subscription? Good and you? I'm good, thank you! Let me check on our late payment policy, one moment please. If payments are late, we charge $2 per day past the due date. If you are a gold or silver member, we do allow a 5 day grace period before adding on the late fees. Great, I am a silver level. Thanks for checking for me. Good, thank you for being a loyal customer :) You have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I help you? Hey, so every time I search the site it's showing 0 results. It does that for no matter what I search for. Okay, I can help with that So the search is broken on our site, correct? What do you recommend here? Yeah even if I search something simple like 'pants' or 'shirt' it shows no results . Ok, sorry you are experiencing this. I'm going to send a report to our internal website team now. Okay great I can help fix it too What should I do? First, try logging out of our account and then logging back in. Sometimes this fixes it. did that work? Okay let me give that the college try the old college try* Nope, didn't seem to work ok. next try clearing the cookies on your browser. I can explain how if you need me to. How's that done? On your browser go to the settings option and then click on More Details and then scroll down to Clear cookies and click it This frequently fixes the issue Okay, let me give that a shot okay great Hey wow that worked! You're a wizard, thanks a million Great! Yep, I'm looking at tons of results for 'shirt' You're welcome. Can I help with anything else? No thank you, that was it! Ok, Have a great day.

target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how remove a paint stain]
input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrand. How may I help you? Hi I have a question about one of your products. It's the calvin klein boots Sure thing, what was your question about? I was wondering how easy it would be to remove paint stains from them? My husband is a housepainter I see, let me find that information for you Alright, I have that information for you. For paint stains, First you want to try to bush off any excess paint. Next you you'll want to take a coarse brush or a toothbrush and flake off any remaining dry paint that you can. Put a mixture of soap and water onto the stain and let it sit for a bit so you can scrape off the now soft paint. Then rub with a detergent mixture. After this is done add a little nail polish remover and the boots will look as good as new! ok that doesn't sound too bad. appreciate it. I hope that was able to answer your question Was there anything else I could do for you today? that's it thanks againn Have a great day and thank you for shopping with us!

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrands. How can I help today? SIR OR MA'AM, I REQUIRE ASSISTANCE. Certainly, what can I help with? I was charged not once, but TWICE for my subscription. That is unacceptable! I demand to dispute my bill and get a prompt refund. I am so sorry about that, let me see what I can do to help. Can I have your full name and account ID? Madame Joyce Wu, if you please. Account ID is CKLUJJ11HJ Thank you, can I also have your order ID? Order ID: 5253043777 Thanks Madame Joyce.  What membership level are you currently at? Merely Bronze, but I intend to upgrade in the future as long as this tomfoolery does not happen again forthwith! OK, let me check to see what the system shows. I do apologize for the confusion, but my system is showing that you are not eligible for a refund at this time. WHAT?!?!! The nerve of you people! Escalate me to your manager, post haste! Absolutely - I will notify the manager to reach out to you immediately to further investigate this discrepancy. Is there anything else I can help you with this afternoon? Thank goodness you are competant. That will be all. Good day. Thank you, you have a great day as well!

That's all Thank you Okay, have a great day

input: Dialogue: Hello. How can I help you today? hi, can you please check on my subscription status? I don't want it to end Okay, so you just want to make sure it's active? Or do you want to know when it's due? that's what I'm checking with you about Which one of those do you want to know? I want to pay it if I need to you can't see that? Okay, so you are here to pay bill - and not to check if it's active, or if it's due? Nope, I don't have any sort of account pulled up and you can't? I just want to clarify what the problem is so I can nail down the correct process. I can, but I won't know what to do/where to check unless I understand what it is you need. So - is your primary objective to 1) pay your bill, 2) find out how much is due for your subscription, or 3) find out if your subscription is active? Each of those leads down a slightly different path. I have a subscription for your premium service...I don't want it to expire...I don't want it to lapse and I want to pay it if I need to...can't explain it much better than that I know, it is confusing and it probably just seems, from your end, like all the same stuff. Unfortunately our process is a bit convoluted. you may need a better system? Maybe :) Just a moment please okay this is taking quite a long time maybe I should just stick with Amazon I am sorry to hear that, I am just trying to ensure I know how to handle your query appropriately. the 3 things that you numbered 1 2 and 3 are ALL the things that I'm here to find out What's your name? David Williams\ Can I have your account and order IDs please? DDNNHKLITF and 8815088995 You owe $20 and it was due yesterday. so I don't have a subscription anymore? You do still have one. But your bill was due yesterday okay, can I pay it now? I have sent you a link to help you access your account, on your online account you can access all of the information you are inquiring about today Yes, you can. Do you have a credit card number you'd like me to use? yes, please thanks it should be on file there Okay Also, do you know your username? no username here...I don't remember it For future notice, when logging into your account, your username is dwilliams1 cool, thanks Okay, I charged $20 to the card on file. Is there anything else I can help you with? oh God no...thanks You continue to have a pleasant day, sir

input: Dialogue: Good afternoon and thank you for contacting AcmeBrands! How can I help you today? Hi! I ordered a CK shirt just now but the receipt shows 2 items. I only ordered 1. Can you help me with that? I'm sorry your order has the wrong quantity applied. I can help you. Can you give me your name and Order ID please? Chloe Zhang and my order ID is 9044990366 Thank you. And do you know your account ID as well? SRNRAS1YVJ Thank you, Chloe. Give me one moment to look at your order details. thank you I'm sorry, our system has made an error and ordered two of the shirts instead of just the one you intended. Do you know the shipping status of your order? it is delivered but I haven' received it yet. Okay, you should be receiving the order today or tomorrow at the latest. Once your order arrives, we ask that you contact us again to start the return process. What was the cost of the shirt? $89 Do I need to pay the fee for returning the item? I'll start the refund for you now, but you'll need to contact us for a return shipping label and it will be free to you to send it back. ok sounds good You should see the refund applied to your method of payment after we receive the unwanted shirt. Is there anything else I can help you with today? That is all. Appreciate your help You're welcome. Enjoy the rest of your day.

input: Dialogue: Welcome to AcmeBrands. How may I help? Hi there.  I am going to have to return my brand-new Tommy Hilfiger jeans and I'm so sad. Ok. I can help. What is the reason for return? They're the wrong color. OK. May I have your full name or account ID? Crystal Minh OK Crystal, I have pulled up your account. You would think that jeans are always blue, right? Yes. I would think so. May I have your username, email address, and order ID I got them so I can take lots of selfies and do Tik Tok videos. Good luck. Tik Tok is all the rage these days. Reminds me of that Kesha song. Oh I'm going to be an influencer.  Just wait.   crystalm354 crystalm354@email.com What's Kesha?  0261304261 Thanks. I have validated your purchase. Kesha is a singer and had a song called Tick Tock What is your member level? I'm Bronze but on my way to Gold, baby!! Haha. Let me check on that Do you have the receipt? I have ALL the receipts...but not this one. OK. Is it still in original packaging? No, I took them out.  Does that make a diff? It depends. What was the purchase date? October 12, 2019 It must be within 90 days. I'm sorry. However, for being a valued bronze customer, I think you deserve a promo code. F9GYD Please use this code on your next order. Sorry it cannot be returned. Okay, cool.  Thanks for trying.  Peace out!! Same. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hi Hello, how can I help you today? The site has been slow for me I'm very sorry to hear that. Let me look in to this issue for you. May I have your name please? Rodriguez Domingo Have you tried logging out of your account and back in? If that doesn't work Rodriguez, can you close the other tabs on your browser and see if it speeds up? Many programs running in the background can often cause the site to slow down. I tried logging out. It didn't help I don't have that many tabs open I'll try closing some programss Thank you, if that doesn't work can you check another website and see if it is also slow? I just want to be sure that it is not your internet connection. Closing the programs seemed to have worked. Thank you I am so glad that worked for you! Is there anything else I can help you with today? That's all. Thanks Thanks, have a great day Rodriguez!

A customer favorite perk is that all members are invited to the annual holiday extravaganza with an open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US! Bronze members save on shipping fees and promo codes. Silver gets all of those plu Silver gets all of that plus they can have agents make purchases on their behalf and they can cancel orders at any time. Gold members gets unlimited refunds and will always be given the benefit of the doubt on transactions. Sorry I got cut off there at one point! WOW!!! That sounds incredible! It is! We love our valued customers :) Is there anything else I can help you with today? No, that's all. I guess I'll go sign up for premium :-) Awesome! I hope you have a great night and enjoy those boots!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Hi there! So totally asking "for a friend" here but uhh if someone happened to get a stain on a particular jacket how would someone go about getting it off Hypothetical of course... Right, let me check on that... for your friend. Thanks...he'll soooo appreciate it..... Could I get your name? Sure thing, it's Crystal Minh Wine stains can be extra hard, did it happen to be a wine stain? I do believe that's what he mentioned yes His cat Filbert cheekily swiped the glass off the counter Start by gently dabbing with a wet cloth. I understand, he's blaming tthe poor cat is he I know right,it's so sad. And oh he says that's starting to work Continue by sprinkling some salt on it and let it for at least five minutes. Salt really? That's cool. Alrighty I've-HE'S got the salt on Next get some boiling hot water on there and rinse. Got it, got it. Oh man that's working wonders.  I say from looking over his shoulder. Finally wash it in the hottest setting. You can line dry or use a dryer on low heat. We will do that. Thank you so much Alright, don't be too hard on that cat. Is there anything else I can do for you today? I think that's everything and oh of course, He's been given catnip as an apology. Thanks again Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? This is so weird! My account isn't showing my payment method correctly at all. Can you help? Happy to help, may I have your full name please? David Williams Maybe it's messed up because I used one of those VISA gift cards last time. Anyway, I want to change my payment method to PayPal. thanks David. Just a second. Is your VISA gift card a debit card? Nah, that's the old payment method. I want to make sure my primary payment method is PayPal now. I need to input your current payment method first, then I will deal with the new method. What is your current payment method? Ohhhh, okay. Yeah it was one of those VISA gift cards that acts like a credit card. thank you. To verify your identity, I also need your zip code and phone number please. Zipcode is  57648 and also PIN number. I don't know the phone number that was on this order. My PIN is 712442 You can provide your username to verify. I don't know my username either How about username, email address or order id? I'm really sorry, I don't have many details to give you. No username, email address, or Order ID. How about telephone number please? Sorry, I don't know the phone number that was used. You have the PIN number, then do you have your password that I can verify? I'm so sorry, I don't know the password. I can give you my name, membership level, PIN, and address. Just a second, let me check. Can you locate your order id from the bottom of the order statement? I'm really sorry, there is absolutely no Order ID on this statement. Just a second. Since I have to verify at least 3 of the above personal data, I am afraid that I can't change the address for you. Sorry about that. Maybe try to locate more information then I can do it for you. I'm really sorry this taking so long. I wish I had more details to give you. Maybe try dwilliams1 as the username? It's just a guess, but that might work. okay, just a second. Sorry the username doesn't work. Please try to get more information and come back at any time. We are happy to help you at any time. Does that sound good? Hi are you there? I'm here. I'm really, really sorry this turned out to be such a hassle. Unfortunately, I'm missing the information you need. Thank you for trying to assist me, I appreciate your assistance! Great, is there anything else that I can help you with? That's it, thank you! Have a nice day!

Why would I want to return something that hasn't even shipped yet? Yes, that's the REFUND police. policy* Would you rather have the return policy? I just need my name stitched onto my jeans I'm sorry, I was looking at the wrong part of our FAQ. I'm still a little new, forgive me. Stitching costs 30 cents per character for the first 15, and 10 cents per character after that. Is there anything else I can help you with? What would my total be to stitch Chloe Zhang onto the jeans It would be $3 total to stitch that name on the jeans. May I have that service added to the jeans in my latest order? input: Dialogue: Hello, Thank you for contacting us, how can I help you? I see, let me see what I can do to help with this. Could you give me your Full name So I can pull up your account please? Crystal Minh Thank you Crystal. And you said this was from a promotional package correct? Yes Let me check with the system to see what happened. Alright I think it may just be an issue in the interface on your end. The credit is definitely showing up on my side. Ok, maybe we just haven't looked in the right place. Try logging in and out and see if it starts to show up Ok, now I see it, thanks! Great! was there anything else I could help you with? No, that's all. Thank you for shopping with us, have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting AcmeBrands! What can I help you with today? How much do I need to buy in order to get free shipping? Let me take a look for you. Thanks. I'm buying my son's birthday gift, but I don't want to spend too much on shipping either. I understand! If the total pre-tax cost of your cart is over $25, then shipping is free. He's got expensive tastes, like me, lol If not, then it's a flat $4.99 fee. Oh, I'm covered then. Thank you! If you need items sooner, though, you can request overnight, which is additional, and is priced by weight. Can I answer anything else for you or help you otherwise today? No, not overnight, so it's ok. That was all I needed. Thank you so much for helping me! You're welcome, have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello! How may I help you? I am trying to get information about a specific product, can you help me? Of course! What product are you wanting to know more about? Yes, a black calvin klein jacket What do you want to know about the jacket? Hello? Does it come in any other colors? And is the item in stock? If the jacket is said to be out of stock on our site, it is temporarily out of stock. We refill our inventory at the end of every month though! Oh, do you have any items that are similar? We should have similar jackets.  What size are you looking for? A large We have a variety of jackets and styles. I am sure you will be able to find one that you prefer. I am looking for a jacket that would be warm enough for going snowboarding in Colorado. Anything like that? Of course! All of our jackets are made with wind proof outside layer and cotton inside to keep you warm. Ok, how long do your items usually take to ship? I am hoping to have one within 2 weeks It will depend on your membership level. Okay I am a guest member But you should have the jacket within 2 weeks regardles. Is there anything else i can help you with? No, thank you for all your help I really appreciate it! Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you? Hi...I will make you work hard today because I have not one but 2 problems! My address has changed so I would need to modify it and I ordered a coat by mistake and wish to cancel it. I'm sorry to hear that and would be happy to help. Okay, so let's start with your address change. Can I please have your name and the current address on file? It now is 5530 brushwick drive in Monterey, NY, 33503 and my name is Joyce Wu And to verify your identity, can I have your zip code, phone number and PIN? 33503, my phone number is 480-853-2735 but I can't seem to find my pin....so sorry....can you do without it? What is your email address? jwu60668@email.com Okay, and what is your new address? The new address is the one I gave you at first 5530 brushwick drive, montery, ny, 33503 Okay, then please verify the current address on file. my mind is blanking....i have been taking medication and I can't seem to remember the exact address I had before Sorry, I'm not able to change the address without verification of the current address due to security reasons. You can access your account here and make changes. thank you so much, i will do it when my husband comes home Okay, let's look into your order. Can I have your account number and order number? What is wrong with the coat? my account id is SZSRI0MXEJ and the order is 7547892013 I bought a black one but it was the kaki one I wanted Would you mind giving me your username? it is jwu60668 What is your membership level? it is bronze Great and when did you make the purchase? on the 16th of november 2019 I apologize, but I can't refund because th 90 window has expired. It is okay....there is not a big difference between black and kaki...it will do! Thank you so much for your patience You're welcome. Anything else? nothing else.....have a good day!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme Brands! How can I help you today? Hi I have a general question I am looking to buy some clothing and was wondering what are the different membership levels? Sure, I can help you with membership questions. Can I have your name? Crystal Minh Crystal, give me on moment while I get that info for you. ok thanks Our membership is a rewards program for our most valued customers. The levels are Bronze, Silver and Gold. All other individuals are considered guests. Being a member is different than having a subscription. and how do I get to the different levels? Memberships are earned through repeated purchases over time. Bronze customer who order over $500 in a year. Silver members order $1000 in a year and Gold make over $2000 in purchases and complete a questionnaire. ok gotcha. I don't think I'll have an issue getting to at least silver thanks for the info Great! Is there anything else I can help you with today? that's it You're welcome. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hi I am really upset today I have an issue Hi, how can I help you? I have a vacation coming up! I am going to Puerto Rico. It's so exciting! That sounds great! I need to buy tons of new clothes for my trip. It's honeymoon with my new husband!!!! But I might be late on a subscription payment You know, I'm over stretched right now because of the wedding It was sooo expensive If I am late on a payment, will there be an issue? Yes they really can be. Like, will I lose my benefits? Let me check into that for you. Okay thanks So would you like to get an extension so you can pay for the subscription a bit latter? Yes, I think that would fix it for me We just have a lot of bills from the wedding But I could pay later That should be fine. Could I get you name or account ID please? Joyce Wu Thanks for that info. Could I get your account ID and order ID? My account ID is 129373 I haven't made an order yet, so no order ID Right, of course. Could I ask what your membership level is with us? Bronze Thanks for that info. I'm so sorry, unfortunately I can't can't extend your subscription at this time. Oh okay Can you tell me what happens if I'm late paying? Just so I understand Please hold for a moment. Okay A $2.00 late fee will be charged per day past the monthly deadline. Oh, okay that's not that bad It sounds like I keep my benefits, right? Hello? I have other things to do today so it would be great if I could have answer Yes, sorry I'm here. I believe you will retain all you benefits as long as the fees are paid and the subscription remains valid. Okay great That's what I needed to know I don't have any other questions Okay, have a nice day.

target: search faq [none]; search for jacket [none]; select topic in faq [how to remove a wine stain]
input: Dialogue: Good afternoon, how can I help you? Yes i was looking at a item on your site and would like to know more about it before i decide to buy it sure, tell me about it I was looking at the Micheal kors jacket ok, what do you need to know about the jackets O would like to know how would i remove a wine stain from it sure, one moment please ok to achieve this you must do the following wet a cotton cloth and gently dab it on the stained area. Then, sprinkle some salt on the area and let it sit for five minutes or more, absorbing the excess water. Next, pour some boiled water on the area to flush out the stain. to finish what you need to do is launder the jacket with the hottest water setting to completely remove any residual marks. okay thank you for your help  a pleasure to help you have a nice day you too

Let's start with your full name please Joseph Banter Sometimes our pricing algorithms change the price based on a number of factors, such as market size and demand. This leads to many price fluctuations. I know that can be frustrating. oh wow Might I suggest signing up for our newsletter so that you don't miss out on sales? You might get some good promo codes through email too. I do get them I just didnt get my unemployment payment until today I can definitely understand that. How about I generate a promo code for you now? That way you can use it while you're able to make the purchase. That would so awesome! Thank you UDFHA is your promo code. Make sure you use it in the next 7 days or it will expire! Is there anything else I can help you with today? no that was all, thank you! Have a beautiful day! You're welcome! I hope you have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Hi! How may I help? Norman Bouchard 0001154344 47BSOQMZX7 normanb5 is user name,, if that matters Thank you! One second. I'm sorry to hear you have an issue with the price. Our algorithms change it on many different bases, such as season, demand, etc. I cannot fix the site's price. well, can't you enter in a discount or a sale over-ride price? we can do that in our system, and I have worked retail for years I can't over-ride the price. As our algorithm cannot be changed. I can offer you a promo code however, to use on any future order. OGUFP and what will that do? It will apply a discount at the time of any future purchase. You will have to apply it to find out how much, it will not work on jewelry, but that is all. no, that is pretty lame, actually surely someone there can do something, after all, you asked me about the price from yesterday I asked about the price from yesterday because it is a common issue. You can just simply not order it, and the promo code can be used whenever you like within the next 7 days if you find something else you want. so the promo code is usable even if I don't order the shirt? Correct. oh wow, well, I was just thinking what a crappy day...  thanks i see the rainbow, lol have a good one and thanks for the promo No problem! I hope you get use from the code. Have a great day!

Norman Bouchard 0001154344 47BSOQMZX7 normanb5 is user name,, if that matters Thank you! One second. I'm sorry to hear you have an issue with the price. Our algorithms change it on many different bases, such as season, demand, etc. I cannot fix the site's price. well, can't you enter in a discount or a sale over-ride price? we can do that in our system, and I have worked retail for years I can't over-ride the price. As our algorithm cannot be changed. I can offer you a promo code however, to use on any future order. OGUFP and what will that do? It will apply a discount at the time of any future purchase. You will have to apply it to find out how much, it will not work on jewelry, but that is all. no, that is pretty lame, actually surely someone there can do something, after all, you asked me about the price from yesterday I asked about the price from yesterday because it is a common issue. However I cannot change it back to yesterday, there is nothing else I can do besides give a promo code that likely covers the extra cost anyway. Very sorry for the issue, is there anything else I can help you with today? no, and I will just not place the order.  It doesn't show ordered, correct? Correct. You can just simply not order it, and the promo code can be used whenever you like within the next 7 days if you find something else you want. so the promo code is usable even if I don't order the shirt? Correct. oh wow, well, I was just thinking what a crappy day...  thanks i see the rainbow, lol have a good one and thanks for the promo No problem! I hope you get use from the code. Have a great day! input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? I got paint on my Tommy Hilfiger boots that I purchased from there and I was wandering if you had any tips for removing the paint stains. No worries let me look that up for you Well our best advice is to first brush off the excess paint Then use a coarser brush to get off as much dried paint as possible Apply a soapy mixture to the area, and that should soften the paint enough to scrape it off Then you should rub the area with a detergent and finish with nail polish remover. That should get any and all paint off the boot. Okay.  I will try that.  Thank you! No worries. Is there anything else you need? That is all for today Then have a nice day!

Could you provide me with your First and last name please? Norman Bouchard Thank you Norman. I was able to pull up your account. ok great How did you hear about the added subscription? Out for Delivery And what is you membership level Crystal? Guest I can't just cancel this order since it is already out for delivery. But as soon as the item arrives you can call back and we can get a shipping label for you to return it. I see. So I will have to call back once I receive the items? Yes, since it has already been shipped out it is too late to cancel. The item will have to be returned when you receive it. Will do. Thank you.. Was there anything else I could help you with today? Gold, like a golden phoenix Haha, I like that! Sure it is Miss Alessandro Phoenix, there is no Mr. Phoenix 0019 1st Ave, Newark CA 99914 Thank you Miss Phoenix, and would you like ot return the item by mail, in store or at one of our drop off centers? mail please Alright everything is set, you should receive and email with the shipping label attached shortly. target: pull up the costumer account [alessandro phoenix]; verify costumer identity [alessandro phoenix, votnzmi8kz, 7376280219]; get shipping status [out for delivery]
input: Dialogue: Hello. Thank you  for contacting us, how can I help you? Hi there! I was wondering if I would be able to ammend my order? I realized that I wanted to add another item to my existing order. Making a change to an order shouldn't be a problem. Let's see what I can do to help. Can I have your first and last name please? Ok thank you. My name is Alessandro Phoenix Thanks so much Alessandro. To pull up the order I'll also need your Account ID and Order ID, could you provide me with those please? Account ID: VOTNZMI8KZ Order ID: 7376280219 Thank you, just a few more things. Can you tell me the shipping status of the order? This should be located on the bottom left of your dashboard. Yes it says out for delivery. Not sure if it is too late Unfortunately because the item is out for delivery I wont be able to add the item to the order however I may still be able to help. Could you tell me your membership level? Ok no worries. I am a Guest Alright, unfortunately I wont be able to add the item to the order. I appologize for the inconvenience. For future reference there are 2 scenarios where I would be able to add an item: If the shipping status is 'In Transit' or 'order Received' OR in special cases with a silver or gold membership. Again, I'm very sorry I wasn't able to help. Ah ok that is ok. Thank you for checking. Next time I will try to catch it sooner. No problem. Was there anything else I could help with today? Nope! That will be all. Thank you for shopping with us, I hope you have a great day!

Can I help you with anything else? `no.....that is all for today. I really appreciate what you did for me! Have a good day. Same to you!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? Yes I am not thrilled with seeing that I am paying $20 more for the same exact shirt Oh, I'm sorry to hear that I saw on your site for $49 yesterday now you want $69 Yes, unfortunately, our pricing algorithm takes a lot of different factors into account, and sometimes changes the prices quite dramatically However, if I may take a look at your account, there might be something that I can do Unfortunately you are not speaking my language dear I don't know what that all means I am 89 years old Tomorrows my birthday Oh, sorry about that.  Essentially, a computer sets out prices for us, and sometimes it leads to terrible surprises such as this one I don't like these darn computers are you real But given the circumstances, I can pull a few strings and get you yesterday's price ok now I understand that dear It's my birthday tomorrow Happy birthday, lets see if we can get you that new shirt just in time may I just gather a few bits of information from you so that I can take a look at your account This would make an old guy like me feel good my daughter didnt send the tie this year information? I am David Williams (ooh, I'm sorry to hear about that.  I'm sure she needed it for facemasks, and it was nothing personal) Thanks, Mr. Williams over at 4777 2nd Ave  La Fayette, TX 9163 Yeah proby right may I also ask your account ID and the order ID of any recent purchase.  They should both be visible on your screen yes dear it is the one with the numbers OQAIML1VZ3 sorry letters Yes, your account ID is the one with numbers and Upper-case letters and the Order ID should be the one that's nothing but numbers and here is the number I got with the order 8054805576 I hope that helps That's perfect, thanks I want to go in the store so I wont bother you guys but you know I cant Yes, I understand, but this is no bother to us at all You must be quite busy I imagine So what I can do for you, is that I can give you a short code, it'll just be a nonsense string of letters We are a little busy, but I can work from home, so that's a good thing I do appreciate your concern, though Thank you dear I am thinking if I can get it for that price I saw and as for your order, this string of letters that I give you, if you just copy that into the box that asks for either "Promo code" or "Coupon code" when you check out, it will automatically knock $20 off the price for you it would make an old guy have a happy birthday Okay so write these letters down? You going to give me some letters Yes, that would be the easiest way One second, please ok I'm ready there we are, the full code is: 1GXVN (that's the number "one" at the beginning) Okay I have it here now 1GXVN Yes, that's perfect Thank you dear You're very welcome.  I hope you have a great birthday tomorrow, even if you can't go out to celebrate I will give them this code to get my own birthday gift Thank you kindly You're welcome.  Is there anything else I could help with while we're here? Just have yourself a blessed day You too Thank you

target: pull up the costumer account [crystal minh]; record reason [calvin klein jacket]; notify team [purchasing department]; make purchase [calvin klein jacket]
input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? I have a question about an item I've been trying for days to buy this Calvin Klein jacket but it never seems to be in stock. Can you confirm if you have any? It looks like we do not have it in stock currently, I'm sorry. Can I please have your name in order to send a complaint to the purchasing department? Crystal Minh I don't know why you seem to have any is it that much of a best seller or something? I have sent that complaint to them. I apologize for the inconvenience! That is one of our most popular jackets. If you'd like, I can back order the item for you. ok but you have no idea when it'll come in stock? I don't have an expected date, but it shouldn't be too long. ok put it on back order for me Ok, and would you like to use the credit card we have on file for you? that's fine I've made that purchase for you, it shouldn't be too long! Again, I apologize. Is there anything else I can help you with today? ok thanks that;s it You have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello! How may I help you today? Hello Im checking on an order I placed Sure, I can help you with that! First, may I have your full name and/or account ID? Chloe Zhang Got it, thanks Chloe! I've pulled up your account. What would you like to check about your order? Some of your options include the shipping status, or the refund status, or the billing status, and so on. If the payment information is correct I believe the money may have been taken out of the wrong account I would like to know the shipping status I see, let's start with looking at the shipping status then. hello I would really like to know if this order is being shipped I do not understand what the problem could possibly be I am a little frustrated Sure, I can find that out for you. Sorry for your frustration! Please give me a second to gather the information that will be needed. Can I have your account ID and order ID, please? my account ID/ or my email address Your account ID, please, although I may also need your email address in a bit. I do not have my id at the moment is there another way you can search the order Sure, I believe I can use your email address and the order ID if you have those available? lets go with the email address that is all I have at the moment chloez28@email.com Thank you, and do you also have your order ID? no unfortunately I'm in a situation where I do not have all the information I would assume the email should suffice Hm, I'm sorry Chloe, but I cannot validate your purchase without your order ID. There is no other way to let me know if my order is being shipped well I have other information like my address what the product is etc well if there is no other way in helping me please let me know Unfortunately not, as far as I can tell. I'm sorry about that. ok well thank you It can often take a few days for something to ship - I'm sorry that I can't offer better advice to you, but hopefully your item will ship soon. Please have a great day, and I'm sorry I couldn't find the information you needed! ok

input: Dialogue: Hello and thanks for contacting AcmeBrands. How can I be of assistance today? Hi. I'm trying to finalize my purchase but for some reason my credit card keeps getting declined. Can you help me? Sure, I'd be happy to help you out with that. One moment. Can I get your first name so I can better address you today? Sure. It is Joseph. Thanks Joseph. I have a couple troubleshooting steps we can run through to see if we can resolve the problem you're having with your credit card today. That would be great! First thing, could you try entering your credit card information again and see if that makes any difference? Sure. Let me try that quickly. Sure. Okay. I did that and it still is saying invalid. Ok, no problem. Can you try logging out of your account, and then back in again? Sometimes that can resolve credit card validation issues. Sure. One minute! Okay. That still doesn't seem to have fixed the problem unfortunately. Ok, no worries. Can you check the expiration date on your credit card and make sure it hasn't expired? Let me look quickly! Oh my! I'm such a klutz. I was reading it as 2020 expiration but it was actually 2019! Thats perfectly alright, it's easy to overlook! Thank you for your help! No problem, happy to be of assistance! Is there anything else I can help you with? That was all. Thanks! Thank you for your business! Have a fantastic day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you? Hi, I'm thinking about buying your guess shirt for my son He's really messy though, so I want to know how easy it is to remove a stain from the shirt like pasta sauce or something Sure, I can let you know how to do that. Could I get your name, please? norman bouchard To remove stains from the shirt you need to rinse it with cold water before it dries and wash it immediately. If its a dried stain you need to soak it in cold water for half and hour and scrub the area with dish soap. Is there anything else I can help you with? no that's it, thank you for your help! Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello I'm kind of in a bind. My car broke down last week, and I am seriously strapped for cash. I need to save some money somewhere. I'm hoping you can help me out with shipping. Ok What type of help do you really need? Can I move the shipping date to next week? That way I won't have to pay for the shipping. Please!!! I'm desperate! I understand you now So can you help? I need the cash bad Yes I can Give me your full name David Williams Also give me your account id and order id Account ID: 6BTM5IR51H Order ID: 3698272003 What is the shipping status of your order? Let's see here...it says delivered, but I'm at the office, so I don't know. I haven't seen it yet. The item has already shipped and the date cannot be altered Man! That stinks! I understand though. What is membership level? It' gold I can only add a credit back into your account for the amount of the shipping fee That's better than nothing! Thanks! Just check back in the next 10 mins Will this be all? Yeah, that's all. Thanks again.

Joseph Banter Call me Joe Alright, Joe, it will be just a moment! Do verify this, I'm going to also need the account ID and Order ID please. To* MS5GSYICDZ 4728281063 What is your membership level? Silver How much was the error? Hmmm... As in, how much were you overcharged. I think that my subscription cost $75 And I was double charged for $150 So it was $75 extra Unfortunately, since you are only a silver member there is nothing I can do about this. I am really sorry. What?? That's not right I should have to be a Gold member to be treated fairly shouldn't, i mean I am so upset My sincere apologies sir, but we can only refund up to $10 for silver. I need to speak to a manager That's crazy!! I'm not paying twice Please connect me to your manager right now I completely understand, I will get you in contact with the manager. What is your phone number? (092) 416-8168 Great, I have forwarded it to the manager and he will contact you as soon as possible. All right We'll see what he can do I'm not going to pay twice Again, I apologize about this I completely understand. Is there anything else I can do for you today? No, that was it Great, you have a good day and I hope the manager is able to get this all sorted out for you. Okay Thanks for trying to fix it

May I have your email address? I don't have that info with me. Can I verify with my phone number? Or security answer? Do you have a pin number? No. We can also use your security question. Thank you/ Be sure to check your email in a secure location to ensure complete safety. A link should be in your email. Is there anything else I can help with? Yes, do you know where I can find water? hoarders have bought it all. Oh, I am so sorry. I do not know. You do not have tap water? No, I do. I was just testing to see if this was a person or a bot. Wu and number is 777654 Thank you When did you realize that this happened? This morning Did you notice on your bill? Yes I did. I need to be refunded please did you see this from an email? Thank you, I did not. I looked at my bill and it was on there How much were you charged? 30 dollars Okay great, I went ahead and removed that subscription for you, and I also refunded you of 30 dollars. is there anything else I can do for you? Thank you a bunch. That's all I needed have a great day

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrand. How may I help you? Hi if my cart qualifies for free shipping? Sure thing, let me see if I can find that information for you. Alright I have that information for you. Your card qualifies for free shipping if the pre-tax cost is greater than $25. This shipping is a standard time of 5 business days.\ So I go get free shipping with this order if I make it If the order does not qualify it will be a flat rate of 4.99 for everything in your cart. Thanks, That is all You may also request overnight shipping at an additional price which is determined by the weight of the delivery. Did you have any further questions? Oh sorry I was so busy typing I didn't see that you had all you needed. Thank you for shoppign with us. Have a great day!

target: pull up the costumer account [chloe zhang]; notify team [purchasing department]; offer promo code [none]
input: Dialogue: Hello Hi, how may I help you today? I am very upset and I need help Oh dear, I will do my best to help you. What's going on? I keep going on your site to try to buy things. But too many of the best items are always out of stock. I don't understand what is going on! I used to love your site, but it's really gone downhill lately. I am very upset and angry If this continues, I won't bother shopping with you anymore I definitely understand your frustration. I hope that we can figure out a solution, because we would hate to lose our relationship with you. Why are so many things out of stock?? This never used to happen Yes, you would lose a wonderful customer What's your full name please? Chloe Zhang Thanks Chloe. I am not positive, but if I were to speculate, I would imagine with the current state of affairs with COVID 19, that a lot more people have time at home to shop and there are fewer people who are able to work along our supply chain. I guess that would make sense That is, fewer people fulfilling orders, making items, delivering, et c. But stores like you need to step up during this difficult time and help people We still have to wear clothes, you know I will reach out to our purchasing department to let them know about your dissatisfaction, first and foremost. All right I would appreciate that Is there anything else you can do to help? I will write a report for them, so that they know where they can improve the experience for customers like you. I can offer you a promo code. I know it won't help today, given that so many items are out of stock. Right I suppose I could hold onto it for later, though I would like the promo code However, we update the online inventory almost daily (not so much on weekends), so you should start seeing the items you want back on the site again. Okay. I will keep that in mind and I will check later for more items The codes are generally good for 7 days, so you won't need to rush to buy today. Your code is W2CCL Maybe as this situation continues you'll adapt to our new reality Thank you I'll hold onto that code for later I hope so, I definitely agree that we need to keep with the times and continue to evolve for our wonderful customers like yourself. I hope that your issue with us was resolved satisfactorily. Well, your excellent customer service has helped restore my faith in this company Thanks for you help I don't have any other questions Wonderful! You've made my day. I hope you have a great remainder of the day.

input: Dialogue: Hello. How may I assist you today? hi I would like to know the price for overnight shipping please. I was thinking about buying a few items and wanted to find out Sure. Just a moment Overnight shipping is a weight-based rate that does not depend on distance if you are located in the continental United States. For continental US-based customers, the rate is $39.99 for items of 5 pounds or less, $54.99 for items of 10 pounds or les I see less, and $69.99 for all other items. For customers based in Hawaii and Alaska, the price is $10.00 higher per weight category. We do not ship outside of the United States. Is there anything else I can help with? Thats what I needed to know. Thanks for your help Thanks, have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Can I have your address adn phone number or Email address? Hello! Thanks for contacting us. To start could I please have your Name, Fist and last or username? Rodriguez Domingo Thank's Rodriguez, what can I help you with today? So I am wanting to buy some stuff but I want to figure out what kind of benefits I get with a premium membership. Sure thing! lets see what I can do to help. Okie dokie Can I please have your Account ID and if available an order ID? I do not have either at them moment. the* not a problem, lets restore your account first and verify the information. 1921 Lincoln Ave.  Monterey CA 77 928-330-7298 Alright, now might I ask if you happen to know your membership level? I do.  It is Gold First let me thank you for being a Gold member. One of the basic benefits is an annual holiday party with free flights from anywhere in the US and has an open bar. ooo an open bar! As a gold member you are also entitles to unlimited refuns and whenever there is a pricing issue you will be given the benefit of the doubt on those transactions refunds* Fantastic! But you had me at open bar. Haha, it is indeed a very nice thing to have. Is there anything else I can do to help you today? That will do it!  Thanks a bunch for your help! LX5LXXQCUA and 6277914584 Okay, I  looked that up for you. Unfortunately, our pricing is done with algorithms and is subject to change at any time. I'm not authorized to change product prices. Can I get a discount at least? Just this one time, I can send you a promo code for being a valued customer.
