target: pull up the costumer account [crystal minh]; verify costumer identity [crystal minh, ibnmnzxpkf, 8806472327]; ask oracle [none]; check membership level [silver]; make purchase [guess jeans]; make purchase [calvin klein jeans]
input: Dialogue: Hello,how can I help you today? I need to check the shipping status of an order I haven't gotten yet. Alright, I can help you with that. Can I get your full name or Account ID? Crystal Minh Thank you Crystal. While I pull up your account I will just clarify that you wanted to check on the shipping status of your order? That's right Can I also get your account ID and Order ID so I can verify your identity? Account ID: IBNMNZXPKF Order ID: 8806472327 One moment while the system searches for this. ok Did you think you should have received your item by now? yes, I should have gotten it 5 days ago So you have been waiting 5 days for it? Are you still there Crystal? yes How long have you been waiting for this? Has it only been 5 days? Yes. i have been waiting 5 days. It can take up to 7 days to arrive so it will likely be there soon. If it doesn't arrive after 7 days we can look in to it again. I was told it would arrive sooner, and I need it by Monday. Do you know the shipping status? No I contacted you to find that out. It was my original question Yes, I realize that. But normally the package takes 7 days and it has only been 5. I really need them by monday for an event. Can you tell me the status. Your order should tell you the shipping status. If it has not been sent yet I can change it to overnight shipping. But without the shipping status I do not know if it has been sent. My system does not give me that information. It hasn't given me any notifications on shipping. Can you change it now? I can not change it without knowing if it has left our facility. Can you overnight a new order and I'll send the other back if it ever comes? I need these jeans for a photoshoot event I can do that. One moment please. thank you so much What is your membership level? Silver Since your are a silver member I will ship your item overnight free of charge. What brand of jeans were you looking at? One pair was Guess and the other was Calvin Klein I have ordered those for you Crystal. They will arrive tomorrow morning. When the other package shows up you can call us and we will get you a label for your return. Is there anything else I can help you with today? That sounds great! That's all thanks! Have a great day  Crystal.

target: pull up the costumer account [alessandro phoenix]; record reason [guess shirt]; notify team [purchasing department]; enter details [guess shirt]; make purchase [guess shirt]
input: Dialogue: Good afternoon. How can I help you today? HI! I have been looking at your website for hours but all Guess shirt is out of stock. Is it possible to get it when it is back?' Oh no, that is so frustrating when that happens. Let's look in to this. May I ask who I am speaking with today? Alessandro Phoenix Thanks Alessandro. So I can assist you better may I ask if it is one product that you are always looking for? Or do you find many different products are out of stock? it is a white guess shirt I think all of guess shirt are out.. maybe because of the spring promotion That is so frustrating though. I'm going to let purchasing know so they can do a better job of ordering. Ok thanks Can you notify me if it is back> I was just going to ask you if you would like me back order it for you? yes please It would be shipped as soon as it was available. Thank you It was the white guess shirt, correct? yes Should I use the credit card on file? yes please Great, I have ordered it and it will be sent to you as soon as it is in stock. Is there anything else I can help you with today Alessandro? That's all Thank you Have a great day!

target: search faq [none]; get memberships information [none]; check pricing [none]; check policy [none]; select topic in faq [policy_4]; pull up the costumer account [albert sanders]; verify costumer identity [albert sanders, v474vzlkpi, 9728480145]; get subscription status [none]; enter details [14]; update costumer account [extend subscription]
input: Dialogue: Hi! How may I help you? Hi! can I ask a question about my membership? Sure! What question? What I need to do to maintain my membership? Membership lasts for the remainder of the calendar year you get it, and the next full calendar year after that. If this is not what you were looking for, feel free to be more specific. Do I need to pay or buy a certain amount to keep my membership? Correct. This amount is situational for each account and will be revealed for each member before they sign up. You must pay each month, however they can be extensions. how much do I have to pay for each level? This depends on each account, I do not have an estimate for you. Apologies. It's ok. Thank you Anything else you need help with today? Oh one more question. WHen is the annual fee is due? It is due each month, depending on the account. One month after you sign up. Is mine due today? if it is, can I pay now? Oh, you should have started with you how you wanted to check your bill! I can help with that, I just need your full name, account ID and order ID please. Albert Sanders Account ID: V474VZLKPI Order ID: 9728480145 It is due tomorrow for 14 dollars and is active. Would you like me to use the card on file to pay it? yes please It has been paid, anything else today? That is all thanks Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello? Good afternoon, what can I do for you? I need to return something that I purchased I bought it in the wrong color. one moment please Sure, no problem Ok thanks, would you give me your full name or account ID. Joseph Banter, I dont know my account ID Do you mean username? username is josephb0 is fine with your full name ok :) Has the product already been received by you Mr. Joseph? or is currently on shipping. input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Thank you. :)  I'm trying to order some things on the website but I'm finding that I can't really even use it right now, because as I'm clicking around nothing much is really happening because it's so slow and stalling out. I will write up a report about the slow speeds for the Website Team to fix. Thank you, I appreciate that. did you try logging out and logging back in? No but I will try that now.  One second please. Tried that, it's still very sluggish and not moving much at all. how about try visiting another website first? Okay, I'll log into my e-mail on another website.  One second. I'm clicking around on Yahoo, their news and anything I click on before logging into e-mail there is working really quickly. Okay. try closing all the other tabs on your broswer. Okay, doing that now. and also other programs that may be running. too many programs running can cause a slowdown. That seems to have helped.  I closed out everything as far as tabs and other programs.  Not so slow now, seems like it's a lot better.  Sorry about that it must've been me slowing things down. No worries. Is there anything else that I can help you with? No no, that's all but thank you for helping me figure that out. Have a nice day! You too!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may i help you today? is there any way i can be of service Yes, I need to buy more jeans. I was wondering how long premium membership lasts? i can assist in answering how long our membership lasts may i have your name please? Albert Sanders. i have an answer for you here Albert Membership lasts for the rest of the calender when you recieved it and the next full calender year, calculated at the beginning of the month for example, if you spen $501 on january 23, then you would be a bronze member starting february first, lasting through the 31st of december the following year I am a silver member. Does it last longer? boost level occur this same way no it does not so your membership will expire a year from end of the year it started in now we have that settled, is there anything else i can help with? No, that is all. have a good day

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Hi there, I want to know how to get a premium membership. I'm planning on buying a lot of things soon. Of course, let's see what we can find out for you. So to qualify for premium membership, these are earned through repeated purchases over a period of time. For example,  Bronze level is given to those with $500 worth in the last year. Silver is for $1000 and finally Gold is for $2000 or more purchases in the last year. Oh okay, so how much for gold and silver? Oh okay, that's unfortunate. I thought you could just pay a fee. Thank you for the answer. No these are based on purchase data only. I see Well, thank you for the help. Have a nice day Of course, is there anything else I can help you with today? Nope that's all Thank you and you have a wonderful rest of your day!
